Looks like Tor relay, not Tor client options?

item.title: Onion Services DDOS Defense Tor 0.4.2.5
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
There are 10 different DoS related options in Tor manual. I am not ready to research/document that. Could be depending on the type of onion service. Popularity. Traffic. Whatnot. There may not be any one fits all solution, I speculate, because otherwise Tor Project would configure that per default (they might have sane defaults). For now only mentioning it here with a stub:

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Onion_Services#Step_4:_Denial_of_Service_Mitigation_Options

Leaving that decision to onion services operators.

Read full topic
